subject: Marathon Running
New York City Marathon
Running
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Mara Yamauchi, owner of Britain’s second-fastest marathon time by a woman, has announced her plans to run the New York City Marathon in November. The announcement was made by Yamauchi yesterday, the day she finished 13th in the 10,000 meters at the European Championships in Goteborg, Sweden. It will be Yamauchi’s first time competing in the New York City Marathon.
